languages.text: "Лорд-капитан, ваши решения всех нас погубят! Лишь жалкие пираты умирают, не рискуя ничем, кроме собственной шкуры. А что вы?"
"Lord Captain, your decision will doom us all! Lowly pirates perish, risking nothing but their own skin — but what of you?"
languages.original_text: "Лорд-капитан, ваши решения всех нас погубят! Лишь жалкие пираты умирают, не рискуя ничем, кроме собственной шкуры. А что вы?"

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, your decision will doom us all! Only the lowly pirates don't have anything to risk in their lives. And what are you doing?"
"Lord Captain, your decision will doom us all! Only the lowly pirates don't have anything to risk in their lives. And what are you doing?"
"Lord Captain, your decision will doom us all! Lowly pirates perish, risking nothing but their own skin — but what of you?"
"Lord Captain, your decision will doom us all! Lowly pirates perish, risking nothing but their own skin — but what of you?"
"Lord Captain, your decision will doom us all! Lowly pirates perish, risking nothing but their own skin — but what of you?"

languages.text: “舰长大人，您的决定会害死我们所有人！海盗之死微不足道，因为他们本来就是亡命之徒——可您呢？”
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, your decision will doom us all! Lowly pirates perish, risking nothing but their own skin — but what of you?"

traits.locale_text: “舰长大人，您的决定会害死我们所有人！海盗之死微不足道，因为他们本来就是亡命之徒——可您呢？”

languages.text: «¡Lord Capitán, su decisión nos condenará a todos! Esos vulgares piratas perecerán, pues no arriesgan más que su propio pellejo... ¿pero y usted?».
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, your decision will doom us all! Lowly pirates perish, risking nothing but their own skin — but what of you?"

traits.locale_text: «¡Lord Capitán, su decisión nos condenará a todos! Esos vulgares piratas perecerán, pues no arriesgan más que su propio pellejo... ¿pero y usted?».

languages.text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, votre décision va tous nous condamner ! Que de vulgaires pirates meurent sans faire aucune autre victime qu'eux-mêmes est une chose, mais vous n'êtes pas comme eux ! »
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, your decision will doom us all! Lowly pirates perish, risking nothing but their own skin — but what of you?"

traits.locale_text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, votre décision va tous nous condamner ! Que de vulgaires pirates meurent sans faire aucune autre victime qu'eux-mêmes est une chose, mais vous n'êtes pas comme eux ! »

languages.text: "Lord Captain, Eure Entscheidung stürzt uns alle in den Untergang. Niedere Piraten vergehen einfach und riskieren nur ihre eigene Haut – aber was ist mit Euch?"
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, your decision will doom us all! Lowly pirates perish, risking nothing but their own skin — but what of you?"

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, Eure Entscheidung stürzt uns alle in den Untergang. Niedere Piraten vergehen einfach und riskieren nur ihre eigene Haut – aber was ist mit Euch?"

languages.text: 「ロード・キャプテン、あなたの決断は私たちすべてを破滅へと導くでしょう！下等な海賊は危険を鑑みず滅びますが、あなたはどうなのです？」
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, your decision will doom us all! Lowly pirates perish, risking nothing but their own skin — but what of you?"

traits.locale_text: 「ロード・キャプテン、あなたの決断は私たちすべてを破滅へと導くでしょう！下等な海賊は危険を鑑みず滅びますが、あなたはどうなのです？」

languages.text: "Kararınız hepimizin felaketi olacak Lord Kaptan! Alçak korsanlar ölsün, kendi canlarından başka kaybedecekleri ne var zaten! Peki ya siz?"
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, your decision will doom us all! Lowly pirates perish, risking nothing but their own skin — but what of you?"

traits.locale_text: "Kararınız hepimizin felaketi olacak Lord Kaptan! Alçak korsanlar ölsün, kendi canlarından başka kaybedecekleri ne var zaten! Peki ya siz?"
